Message:
The people from the Inquisition
ran down the main street,
off into the distance.

Till their footsteps grew faint,
I couldn’t stop shakin’.

Ever since I awakened as a witch,
this is how I’ve spent my days...

Get found, then run.
Rinse an’ repeat.
How long will this go on...?

If life was gonna be like this,
I should never’ve even been...!

But, just then,
I heard roars of laughter
comin’ from somewhere nearby.

It was the kinda laughter
with the warmth that could lift
even the lowest of spirits.

The only places witches
can safely survive
are the darkest of back alleys.

Feelin’ as if that laughter
was callin’ my name,
I stepped out into the light.
